items.abstract: The studied Ru polypyridyl complexes are ca. ten times more cytotoxic against breast cancer (4T1) and human lung adenocarcinoma epithelial cells (A549) than cisplatin and have a distinct impact on cell adhesion, migration and endothelial cell vasculature.
